query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS idea_analysis (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ideaId INT NOT NULL,
  overallScore DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  classification ENUM('innovation','commercial','weak') NOT NULL,
  technicalNoveltyScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  socialImpactScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  technicalFeasibilityScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  commercialValueScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  scalabilityScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  sustainabilityScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  technicalRiskScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  timeToMarketScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  competitiveAdvantageScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  organizationalReadinessScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  trlLevel INT NULL,
  trlDescription TEXT NULL,
  currentStageGate ENUM('ideation','scoping','business_case','development','testing','launch') NULL,
  stageGateRecommendation TEXT NULL,
  aiAnalysis TEXT NULL,
  strengths JSON NULL,
  weaknesses JSON NULL,
  opportunities JSON NULL,
  threats JSON NULL,
  recommendations JSON NULL,
  nextSteps JSON NULL,
  similarInnovations JSON NULL,
  extractedKeywords JSON NULL,
  sentimentScore DECIMAL(5,2) NULL,
  complexityLevel ENUM('low','medium','high','very_high') NULL,
  marketSize TEXT NULL,
  competitionLevel ENUM('low','medium','high','very_high') NULL,
  marketTrends JSON NULL,
  status ENUM('pending','completed','failed') DEFAULT 'pending',
  processingTime INT NULL,
  analyzedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX ideaId_idx (ideaId)
);
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3ENKKjNgJaxqLcS.fa3a405d8687 --database fqijacsWw6AUmwQQsRR8Z9 --execute CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS idea_analysis (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  ideaId INT NOT NULL,
  overallScore DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL,
  classification ENUM('innovation','commercial','weak') NOT NULL,
  technicalNoveltyScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  socialImpactScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  technicalFeasibilityScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  commercialValueScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  scalabilityScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  sustainabilityScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  technicalRiskScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  timeToMarketScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  competitiveAdvantageScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  organizationalReadinessScore DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0 NOT NULL,
  trlLevel INT NULL,
  trlDescription TEXT NULL,
  currentStageGate ENUM('ideation','scoping','business_case','development','testing','launch') NULL,
  stageGateRecommendation TEXT NULL,
  aiAnalysis TEXT NULL,
  strengths JSON NULL,
  weaknesses JSON NULL,
  opportunities JSON NULL,
  threats JSON NULL,
  recommendations JSON NULL,
  nextSteps JSON NULL,
  similarInnovations JSON NULL,
  extractedKeywords JSON NULL,
  sentimentScore DECIMAL(5,2) NULL,
  complexityLevel ENUM('low','medium','high','very_high') NULL,
  marketSize TEXT NULL,
  competitionLevel ENUM('low','medium','high','very_high') NULL,
  marketTrends JSON NULL,
  status ENUM('pending','completed','failed') DEFAULT 'pending',
  processingTime INT NULL,
  analyzedAt TIMESTAMP NULL,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  updatedAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  INDEX ideaId_idx (ideaId)
);
